articles.author: Timour Azhari, Maya Gebeily
articles.title: Syria central bank vaults left unscathed by Damascus looters, sources say
articles.description: The vaults in Syria's central bank were left unscathed by looters in the turmoil that briefly engulfed the capital Damascus after the overthrow of president Bashar al-Assad, a senior business leader and three other sources told Reuters.

articles.author: Callum Rice-Coates
articles.title: 'I think that’s the respectful thing for two captains to do after a game. I probably boiled over a bit at the end, with a bit of everything coming out': Jarrod Bowen lifts lid on heated clash with Mario Lemina after West Ham's win over Wolves
articles.description: Jarrod Bowen has revealed what happened before his tussle with Mario Lemina after West Ham's victory against Wolves.
articles.content: Wolves suffered another blow in their fight to avoid relegation on Monday night as they fell to a 2-1 defeat at West Ham. In a game dubbed El Sackico because of the increasingly precarious positions … [+2394 chars]

articles.author: Lawrence Hurley
articles.title: Supreme Court probes environmental review of Utah oil railway
articles.description: The Supreme Court justices will weigh the fate of an 88-mile railroad project that would transport crude oil in Utah as they consider a dispute over whether federal officials conducted a stringent enough environmental review before approving it.
articles.content: WASHINGTON The Supreme Court on Tuesday weighed the fate of an 88-mile railroad project that would transport crude oil in Utah in a dispute over whether federal officials conducted a stringent enough… [+4633 chars]

articles.title: Mycocycle uses mushrooms to upcycle old tires and construction waste | TechCrunch
articles.description: The startup's fungi use their mycelium to consume oil-based rubbers and plastics, creating new bio-based materials in the process.
articles.content:
Usually, when something starts to rot, it gets pitched in the trash. But Joanne Rodriguez wants to turn the concept of rot on its head by growing fungus on trash to turn it into something better.

articles.title: Adding wild fungi to soil could make trees store more carbon
articles.description: A loblolly pine plantation in the state of Georgia is the test site for a start-up company trying to see if improving the fungi and other microbes in soil can help trees grow bigger and faster
articles.content:
